parameter.name: deviceAddress
parameter.label: Scalar Web URL
parameter.description: The URL access point for the Scalar Web

parameter.name: deviceMacAddress
parameter.label: Device MAC Address
parameter.description: The MAC address of the device (TV, bluray, etc)

parameter.name: irccUrl
parameter.label: IRCC URL
parameter.description: The URL access point for the IRCC Service

parameter.name: modelName
parameter.label: Device Model Name
parameter.description: Specify the model name if not automatically discovered (see Discovered Model Name)

parameter.name: accessCode
parameter.label: Access Code
parameter.description: The access code (or "RQST" to request one)

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: The interval, in seconds, to refresh the device state (-1 to disable)

parameter.name: retryPolling
parameter.label: Retry Polling
parameter.description: The time, in seconds, to retry a connection attempt (-1 to disable)

parameter.name: checkStatusPolling
parameter.label: Status Check Interval
parameter.description: The time, in seconds, to check the device status (-1 to disable)

parameter.name: discoveredMacAddress
parameter.label: Discovered MAC Address (READONLY)
parameter.description: The MAC address that was initially discovered - use the Device Mac Address to override

parameter.name: discoveredCommandsMapFile
parameter.label: Discovered Commands Map File (READONLY)
parameter.description: The Commands Map File that was initially discovered - use the Commands Map File to override

parameter.name: discoveredModelName
parameter.label: Discovered Model Name (READONLY)
parameter.description: The Model Name that was initially discovered - use the Device Model Name to override
